title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, and tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’).

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui; open-source ChatGPT-style interface for Ollama and OpenAI APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter template for building RAG apps with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that sends code or prompts to Ollama and inserts responses inline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK for Ollama with .NET 6+ support and NuGet package.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama models as async chat endpoints with API keys.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models from any channel.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset-ai enabling Ollama models in production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase of Ollama projects.
